summary: This folder serves as the core library package for managing Vast.ai GPU instances, providing the foundational logic for provisioning, remote execution, and instance lifecycle management. It defines the public API for programmatic interaction with cloud GPU infrastructure, abstracting complex SSH and API operations into high-level Python interfaces.
responsibilities: Defining the build system and package metadata for the vastctl-core library
Providing a high-level Python API for searching and filtering GPU offers
Managing instance lifecycles including creation, starting, stopping, and destruction
Handling secure remote command execution and environment variable injection via SSH
Managing file transfers and workspace backups to/from remote instances
Standardizing configuration management for API keys and default hardware specs
